content.en: Light-field enhancement: Researchers are exploring ways to improve the capabilities of light-field cameras, which capture more information about a scene than traditional cameras. They are developing algorithms that can estimate depth, remove reflections, handle occlusion, and enhance the quality of images captured by these cameras. These algorithms aim to make light-field cameras more efficient, accurate, and capable of producing high-quality images.
content.da: Lysfeltforbedring: Forskere undersøger måder at forbedre kapabiliteterne af lysfeltkameraer, som indfanger mere information om en scene end traditionelle kameraer. De udvikler algoritmer, der kan estimere dybde, fjerne reflektioner, håndtere okklusion og forbedre kvaliteten af billeder taget af disse kameraer. Disse algoritmer sigter mod at gøre lysfeltkameraer mere effektive, præcise og i stand til at producere billeder af høj kvalitet.
